item.title: YENOCK - Digitaler Bilderrahmen WiFi 10 1 Zoll 1280x800 IPS LCD Touchscreen Eingebauter 32GB Speicher Auto-Rotat Teilen Sie Momente sofort Ã¼ber Frameo App von Ã¼berall Schwarz
item.description:
Es gibt ein YENOCK - Digitaler Bilderrahmen WiFi 10 1 Zoll 1280x800 IPS LCD Touchscreen Eingebauter 32GB Speicher Auto-Rotat Teilen Sie Momente sofort Ã¼ber Frameo App von Ã¼berall Schwarz hier:

â„¹ï¸:

  • INSTANT WIRELESS SHARING: No matter where you are in the world, you can use the Frameo app to send photos to all connected YENOCK WiFi photo frames. Photos can be presented within a few seconds, and share your wonderful moments simultaneously. Add a caption to the photo to fully show your experience!
  • HIGH DEFINITION TOUCH SCREEN: Super 10.1 inch touch screen. Ultra high definition 1280*800 resolution display. 16:10 length and width ratio. To greatly display the true colors and every detail. The IPS screen implements 178 Â° without dead ends. Recalling your precious memories. Browse through photos, delete videos, or pause the slideshow, with a quick tap of the finger. Brightness and sleep mode can be adjusted in settings as you want.
  • PERFECT GIFT TO KEEP CONNECTED: Frameo allows you to easily share photos with friends and family. YENOCK electronic photo frames have exquisite packaging, are the perfect gifts for parents, grandparents, and grandparents, on the anniversary, birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving, Mothers Day, Fathers Day, etc.
  • AUTO-ROTATE & LARGE INTERNAL STORAGE: YENOCK picture frame can automatically rotate photos to adjust the direction, which allows you to place the WiFi photo frame in either portrait or landscape mode or on the wall. Built-in 32GB Memory empowers a huge capability of storage (around 80,000 photos of 300KB/pc). Also support max 128GB micro SD card for file management.
  • NO RISK PURCHASE & 1 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Our YENOCK factory has strict standards for raw materials to ensure the quality of these smart frames. Before shipment, all WIFI frames will be subjected to 200 hours of machine aging test, ensuring that each picture frame runs well before delivery. Also, we provide lifetime support, one year limited warranty, prompt response within 24 hours.
